tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE money_transfers (
    transfer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id UUID NOT NULL,
    receiver_id UUID NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    transfer_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sender_id INT NOT NULL,
  recipient_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
	customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	customer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	customer_email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
	customer_balance DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE transactions (
	transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	sender_id INT NOT NULL,
	receiver_id INT NOT NULL,
	amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
	transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
	FOREIGN KEY (sender_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (receiver_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
)

CREATE TABLE transaction_logs (
	log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	transaction_id INT NOT NULL,
	log_description TEXT NOT NULL,
	log_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
	FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES transactions(transaction_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_account_id INT REFERENCES Accounts(account_id),
    destination_account_id INT REFERENCES Accounts(account_id),
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    from_account_id UUID REFERENCES Accounts(account_id),
    to_account_id UUID REFERENCES Accounts(account_id),
    amount DECIMAL(15, 2) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW()
);
